My mother was the first child born to 황운학 (黃雲鶴)김연화 (金蓮花)

There would be 4 more daughters born into the family.

Then 13 years after she was born, a son was born.

Sadly, that same year, her father passed away at age 36.

1.  현실

2.  현숙

3.  현애

4.  현덕

5.  현신

6.  태민

This is the record issued from the local Korean government. Note that many of the families from Korea adjusted their age. To compensate for lost years during the war
